channel.title: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server
channel.description: i can't get on the hybridscape server (127.0.0.1) i don't know why, it says no response from server even when i have done the start server and then it goes on saying error connecting ??? any help plz plz. (i have latest java). :confused:

item.title: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server
item.dc:creator: @man_u_4eva9 man u 4eva9
item.description:
@man_u_4eva9 wrote:

Yes but can usally only go on a server if uve been on 127.0.0.1 before, reinstall moparscape, go on control panel>>ad or remove programs>>remove moparscape

then downlaod it again, if it still doesnt work make sure you ahve the latest version of java.

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server

item.title: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server

item.description:

You can look for a server in Advertisement.

item.source: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server

item.title: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

[quote=“J, post:13, topic:55305”][quote author=123idontno link=topic=78319.msg867350#msg867350 date=1170715673]
thats because you changed something in cilent.java…
i had this problem and figure it out and what i did is reinstalled moparscape

----hope it helped----
[/quote]

LOL. How do you change client.java in a built in source? ROFL. That made me laugh.

On topic: All you need to do is Restart mopar, non of that reinstalling crap.
If you dc, it’s your computer; not the client.[/quote]

LOL, its not build in! you can find it at program files/moparscape/hybridscape, and you can download the .java files somewhere on this forum

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server

item.title: Plz help i can't get on to 127.0.0.1 hybrid server
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

[quote=“123idontno, post:2, topic:55305”]thats because you changed something in cilent.java…
i had this problem and figure it out and what i did is reinstalled moparscape

----hope it helped----[/quote]

LOL. How do you change client.java in a built in source? ROFL. That made me laugh.

On topic: All you need to do is Restart mopar, non of that reinstalling crap.
If you dc, it’s your computer; not the client.

Read full topic
